data.name: Duality
data.description: Dive into the depths of the exiled emperor's mind in search of dark secrets

extraRewards.title: Master Specific Rewards
extraRewards.description: Armor dropped in Master contains the Artifice intrinsic trait

extraRewards.title: Hidden Chests
extraRewards.description: There are two hidden chests that award anything you've already acquired

typeModifiers.name: Champions: Unstoppable
typeModifiers.description: This mode contains Unstoppable Champions, which cannot be stopped without an Unstoppable mod

typeModifiers.name: Champions: Barrier
typeModifiers.description: This mode contains Barrier Champions, which cannot be stopped without an Anti-Barrier mod

typeModifiers.name: Match Game
typeModifiers.description: Enemy shields are highly resistant to all unmatched elemental damage

encounters.title: Mindscape Jumping Puzzle
encounters.description: Navigate thru the Mindscape by shooting the bells to switch between realms

encounters.title: Nightmare of Gahlran
encounters.description: Defeat Gahlran. Kill the Standard Bearers in the Nightmare realm and plant the Standard Essence you received into the symbol in the normal realm. Do this x2 to start damage on Gahlran

encounters.title: Dive Deeper
encounters.description: Surprise surprise, more jumping puzzles to navigate thru

encounters.title: Statue Puzzle
encounters.description: Turn the statues to all face the bell in the middle. Use the Nightmare realm to turn them by the switch on the back of each statue

encounters.title: The Vault
encounters.description: Defeat all three mini bosses. Grab the Standard Essence by killing the Standard Bearer in the Nightmare realm and planting it to it's corresponding symbol in the normal realm, then kill the mini boss that spawns in. You'll need to do this x3

encounters.title: Navigate the Vault
encounters.description: Yet another jumping puzzle on the way to the boss

encounters.title: Nightmare of Caiatl
encounters.description: Defeat Caiatl. Similar to the previous encounters, grab the Standard Essence, plant the essence in the matching symbol, then you'll start damage phase. There's an annoying amount of ads here so watch out

data.name: Grasp of Avarice
data.description: A cautionary tale for adventurers willing to trade their humanity for riches

extraRewards.title: Master Specific Rewards
extraRewards.description: Armor dropped in Master contains the Artifice intrinsic trait

extraRewards.title: Hidden Chests
extraRewards.description: There are two hidden chests that award anything you've already acquired

typeModifiers.name: Champions: Overload
typeModifiers.description: This mode contains Overload Champions, which cannot be stopped without an Overload mod

typeModifiers.name: Champions: Barrier
typeModifiers.description: This mode contains Barrier Champions, which cannot be stopped without an Anti-Barrier mod

typeModifiers.name: Match Game
typeModifiers.description: Enemy shields are highly resistant to all unmatched elemental damage

encounters.title: Loot Cave Entrance
encounters.description: Gather enough engrams to enter the loot cave

encounters.title: Phry'zhia, The Insatiable
encounters.description: Defeat the oversized ogre. Gather engrams by killing enemies and depositing them at the crystal, then do some optimal damage

encounters.title: Sparrow Run
encounters.description: Mount your fastest sparrow and make it to the end. Be sure to get those mines on the floor for more time

encounters.title: Fallen Shield
encounters.description: Bring down the Fallen's shield. Find and defeat the Servitors around the area by killing enemies to gather engrams. Deposit enough of them and you'll be able to kill the Servitor. Roll the Servitors corpse to the canons and yeet it into the shield

encounters.title: Captain Avarokk, The Covetous
encounters.description: Kill Avarokk. As before, kill enemies to gather engrams and deposit them at the crystal in the middle. Watch out for his buddies

data.name: Pit of Heresy
data.description: Deep beneath Sorrow's Harbor, the Hive keep their darkest secrets

extraRewards.title: Hidden Chests
extraRewards.description: There are two hidden chests that awards random gear

encounters.title: Necropolis
encounters.description: Open the door to dive further. Drop into the first tower right off the cliff to find your runes. Goto each of the towers with these runes above them and kill the bosses inside. You'll need to kill the big Knight to get it's sword to actually do damage

encounters.title: Wall of Doors
encounters.description: Find the right door to go thru

encounters.title: Tunnels of Despair
encounters.description: Clear all three vessels. Gather the orbs from a Knight inside the tunnels. Dunk that orb into one of the vessels at the end of each pathway. Watch out for the unkillable Orgres roaming

encounters.title: Chamber of Suffering
encounters.description: Remove all runes from the pillar. Kill the Knights towards the back to gather their orbs and dunk them into the pillar in the middle; you'll need to do this 6 times. Watch out for the Curse of Suffering debuff that will wipe you

encounters.title: The Harrow
encounters.description: Clear the pillars of enemies. Find the pillars that match the runes in the entrance that you drop down from. The pillar will have Wizards and other enemies guarding them. Kill them to clear it and proceed onto the next one

encounters.title: Zulmak, Instrument of Torment
encounters.description: Defeat Zulmak. Kill the big Knights roaming to get their swords and defeat the 3 mini-bosses around the room. Gather the orbs dropped by them and dunk them at the vessels in the middle. Then onto damage phase for Zulmak

data.name: Prophecy
data.description: Enter the realm of the Nine and ask the question: "What is the nature of the Darkness?"

extraRewards.title: Hidden Chests
extraRewards.description: There are two hidden chests that award anything you've already acquired

encounters.title: Entrance
encounters.description: Cleanse the pillars. Gather motes by killing the Knights in the Light or Dark (literally) and dunking them in their respective pillars

encounters.title: Phalanx Echo
encounters.description: Defeat the Phalanx boss. Similar to the first area, gather motes by killing the Knights and dunking the Light and Dark motes into the pillars to bring down his shield, then onto damage

encounters.title: The Wasteland
encounters.description: Find and destroy the blights around the Wasteland to proceed

encounters.title: Hexahedron
encounters.description: Escape the room. Look for Toland's orb, he'll be above you, to see which pillar you need motes for (Light/Dark). The room will rotate once you dunk enough motes into it and you'll need to do it again till you eventually reach the Centurion bosses

encounters.title: Rainbow Road (Deadsea)
encounters.description: Ride your sparrow (or don't) to end of the Rainbow Road

encounters.title: Kell Echo
encounters.description: Defeat Kell Echo. Gather and dunk Light and Dark motes into their pillars around the room; it'll a spawn an Ogre you'll need to kill. After you do you'll get transported to a different area to face the boss

encounters.title: Final Chest (Not really an encounter)
encounters.description: Grab your loot!

data.name: The Shattered Throne
data.description: Strike back at the curse that plagues the Dreaming City

extraRewards.title: Hidden Chests
extraRewards.description: There are two hidden chests that awards random gear

encounters.title: The Labyrinth
encounters.description: Kill all the mini bosses in each area. Find the area with the symbol at the beginning of the encounter and kill the mini boss there. You'll find another symbol that denotes another you need to do the same at. Once all areas are cleared, head back to the starting spot and continue on

encounters.title: The Descent
encounters.description: Continue onwards. Keep on going towards the next encounter, there will be a lot of enemies along the way including a hallway full of Thralls (you'll be super slowed) and a catwalk full of Ogres

encounters.title: Vorgeth, The Boundless Hunger
encounters.description: Kill the big Ogre. Defeat all 4 Wizards around the room get x4 of Petitioners Mark. Dunk the buff into one of the stations in the middle to remove Vorgeth's shield; then onto damage

encounters.title: Climb the Tower
encounters.description: Follow the path to make your way up

encounters.title: Dûl Incaru, the Eternal Return
encounters.description: Kill the boss. Defeat the Abyssal Champion Knights roaming the area quickly or an army of Psions will spawn in. Once you'll defeat the Knights you'll be able to damage Dûl Incaru
